whole_object: The classroom was so quiet you could hear a pin drop, probably because the students were on a roll... to another class!
single_object:
- Tables: These tables are outstanding in their field—mostly because they never learned how to sit.
- Chairs: Chairs in this room always stand up for what they believe in—unfortunately, it's usually just the floor.
- Whiteboard: This whiteboard is truly remarkable—especially when it's clean and can't remember anything.
- Projector screen: The projector screen is clearly a movie fan—it loves to hang out and watch the pictures come to life.
multi_object:
- Tables  
- Chairs  
- "These tables are so supportive, they should start a therapy group for chairs with commitment issues!"  

- Chairs  
- Whiteboard  
- "These chairs are always ready to take a seat at the whiteboard's brainstorming sessions, but they never seem to get any ideas!"  

- Whiteboard  
- Projector screen  
- "The whiteboard and projector screen are in a constant battle—one wants to draw attention, while the other just wants to project its feelings!"  

- Projector screen  
- Tables  
- "The projector screen is so dramatic; it always wants to make a scene, but the tables just want to keep things grounded!"
